reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pousada Porto Imperial is nice and confortable. The rooms are a bit old fashioned (basin in the room and the shower and toilet in a separate room) but nice too.
reviews.title: Relax in Paraty

reviews.text: The pool area is great, with a stem sauna and Jacuzzi. A great place to relax after a beach day.
reviews.title: pleasant courtyard

likes.disliked: — unused formal living area in the front

reviews.title: Pousada Porto Imperial, Parati
reviews.text: Many trip advisors recomendations are far of the historical nice village, so if you don´t have a car is quite unconfortable to go there for dinner of drinks. Pousada Porto Imperial IS in the village and that is a plus.
A great place to stay in Paraty
reviews.title: Charming place, charming staff!
